comment: Closure of the square submatrix: if ` M ` is a square matrix of dimension ` N ` with indices in ` ( 1 ... N ) ` , then a submatrix of ` M ` is of dimension ` ( N - 1 ) ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Aug-2020.)
